span.a: View the Somers Public Schools COVID-19 Information Page

p.style: color: rgb(52, 88, 112); font-family: Roboto, RobotoDraft, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;

span.style: font-family: "times new roman", times, serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

span.strong: Grab and Go Meals for Students

p.style: color: rgb(52, 88, 112); font-family: Roboto, RobotoDraft, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;

span.style: font-family: "times new roman", times, serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: To help support families during this pandemic, Somers Public Schools will be distributing "grab and go" breakfast and lunches for ALL students that live in Somers. We will start distribution Monday, March 23rd. Parents should plan to pick up their bags at Somers High School from 9-11 am in the front lobby. Below is the distribution schedule:

ul.style: color: rgb(52, 88, 112); font-family: Roboto, RobotoDraft, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;

span.style: font-family: "times new roman", times, serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

li.span: On Monday and Wednesday, students will receive breakfast and lunch for two days.

span.style: font-family: "times new roman", times, serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
font-family: "times new roman", times, serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

li.span: On Friday, students will receive breakfast and lunch for that day only.

p.style: color: rgb(52, 88, 112); font-family: Roboto, RobotoDraft, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;

span.style: font-family: "times new roman", times, serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: No distribution of food on Tuesday, Thursday, or the weekend. We plan on continuing this distribution as long as the need arises, or we are otherwise directed.

p.style: color: rgb(52, 88, 112); font-family: Roboto, RobotoDraft, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;

span.style: font-family: "times new roman", times, serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: For us to get a good count and not waste food, please visit the link below if your family would like to participate.

a.title: SPS
a.span: Click here for the Grab and Go Meal Form

hr.br:
Effective Monday, March 16th - Somers Public Schools will be closed indefinitely. District administrators will be working with state and local officials to determine the date that the schools will re-open. If you have any questions, please contact your child's school's main contact:
Somers Elementary School: Corinne Bouchard
corinne.bouchard@somers.k12.ct.us
Mabelle B. Avery Middle School: Michelle Wolters
michelle.wolters@somers.k12.ct.us
Somers High School: Amanda Zajaczkowski
amanda.zajaczkowski@somers.k12.ct.us
District Offices: Linda Ford
linda.ford@somers.k12.ct.us
Technology Questions:
techhelp@somers.k12.ct.us
Business Office: Bill Boutwell
b.boutwell@somers.k12.ct.us
Health Services Department: Cheryl Fryl
cheryl.fry@somers.k12.ct.us
Pupil Services: Denise Messina
denise.messina@somers.k12.ct.us
We recognize that the current public health emergency is resulting in an increase of stress on families.
If you or your child are experiencing an immediate safety concern: call 911.
If you or your child are experiencing a behavioral mental health crisis: call 211.
If you would like to access support services, please contact the following:
Somers Social Service Department: Allison Maynard at (860) 265-7551
If you would like to contact your child’s counselor or social worker, please do so via their school email address.

div.div: Due to Covid-19, the 2020 Preschool Child Find Screening is postponed until further notice. Please continue to check this website for updates, we will post them as we determine next steps.
Please view our webpage for information about our preparations and a variety of resources we hope you find helpful.
